body:
The C++ shape fn can do this correctly, but has a bug - it is explicitly checking input_tensor instead of just calling MakeShapeFromShapeTensor  (MakeShapeFromShapeTensor used to not be able to handle this case correctly, but now does).

Can you instead change core/ops/nn_ops.cc -> the InputTensorShapeOrUnknown function doesn't need to call input_tensor and check for nullptr, it can just call MakeShapeFromShapeTensor.
body_html:

body_text:
The C++ shape fn can do this correctly, but has a bug - it is explicitly checking input_tensor instead of just calling MakeShapeFromShapeTensor  (MakeShapeFromShapeTensor used to not be able to handle this case correctly, but now does).
Can you instead change core/ops/nn_ops.cc -> the InputTensorShapeOrUnknown function doesn't need to call input_tensor and check for nullptr, it can just call MakeShapeFromShapeTensor.
